name: 劉立雯
objective:
認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。

This course helps students  familiarize with the syntax, style, and organization used in English research papers.
schedule:
Week 1 Course Introduction & Explanation
Week 2 Part 1 Basic knowledge about writing a research paper
Week 3 Ditto
Week 4 Part 2 Thesis frame work
Week 5 Ditto
Week 6 Part 3 Details in the article--wording
Week 7 Sentence patterns
Week 8 Paragraph principles
Week 9 Midterm Exam
Week 10 Midterm discussion
Week 11 Grammar
Week 12 Ditto
Week 13 Verb tenses
Week 14 Ditto
Week 15 Punctuation
Week 16 Acronyms
Week 17 Charts
Week 18 Final Exam, Thesis Abstract due
